com.shwy.bestjoy.view

类 IcsColorDrawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • Drawable
      • com.shwy.bestjoy.view.IcsColorDrawable

  • public class IcsColorDrawable
extends Drawable
    A version of android.graphics.drawable.ColorDrawable that respects bounds.
